definition[0]: money that is available to someone who works for a company so that they can pay for meals, hotels etc when travelling or entertaining people for work
example[0]: I have an expense account and spend about £10,000 a year on entertaining.
definition[1]: a company account that an employee can use for money that they have to spend as part of their job, for example on hotels, meals etc
example[1]: I have an expense account and spend about £20,000 a year on entertaining clients.
